WorkReward.name: WorkReward
WorkReward.description: Used to store reward codes tied to a Reward Fund. Reward Funds must have at least one WorkReward record.

Code.description: Represents a singe reward code tied to a RewardFundId.

OwnerId.description: Represents the User ID of Owner of WorkReward record

RecipientId.description: Salesforce User ID for User associated with this WorkReward record.

RedemptionDisclaimer.description: The disclaimer information about the WorkReward.

RedemptionInfo.description: The instructions for redeeming the WorkReward.

RedemptionUrl.description: The URL for redeeming the WorkReward.

RewardFundId.description: Salesforce unique ID for WorkRewardFund record that is associated with WorkReward record.

RewardFundTypeId.description: Salesforce unique ID of the WorkRewardFundType associated with the WorkReward.
